description: The ListConnectionTypes API provides a discovery mechanism to learn available connection types in Glue. The response contains a list of connection types with high-level details of what is supported for each connection type. The connection types listed are the set of supported options for the ConnectionType value in the CreateConnection API.

nested_items.name: ConnectionTypes
nested_items.description: A list of ConnectionTypeBrief objects containing brief information about the supported connection types.

nested_items.name: ConnectionType
nested_items.description: The name of the connection type.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the connection type.

nested_items.name: Capabilities
nested_items.description: The supported authentication types, data interface types (compute environments), and data operations of the connector.

nested_items.name: SupportedAuthenticationTypes
nested_items.description: A list of supported authentication types.

nested_items.name: SupportedDataOperations
nested_items.description: A list of supported data operations.

nested_items.name: SupportedComputeEnvironments
nested_items.description: A list of supported compute environments.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, if the current list segment is not the last.
